name: UpHeroDownEnemies
description:
Up Hero Down Enemies is a game that you have to survive each battle. For this equip a weapon, up your stats, choose a potion and stats to downgrade the enemy.

Thanks for playing and enjoy the battle!

========

This game was been created in Unity Engine for Ludum Dare 46.

Theme: Keep it alive!

Credits: 

  • Music (Battle in the winter) -Johan Brodd 
  • Sound Effects - Kenney
  • Assets: 0x72
